articles.author: Newsday Staff
articles.title: Charles Dolan, media pioneer and Cablevision founder, dies at 98 - Newsday
articles.description: Dolan founded Home Box Office Inc., later known as HBO, American Movie Classics and launched the country's first 24-hour cable channel for local news.
articles.content:
Charles F. Dolan, a media and telecommunications pioneer who founded Cablevision Systems Corp., has died, a family spokesperson said Saturday. He was 98.
Dolan first changed the landscape of televis… [+9162 chars]
